title: Power of the Zephyr
description: Power of the Zephyr continues the Rowan of the Wood fantasy series with further adventure and magical mayhem. The Freak Squad, as Trudy takes to calling them, confront Fiana in the desert of Northern Nevada. she has developed a cult of mesmerized zombies in an intricate plot to capture Rowan and his wand for herself, once and for all. Powerful and poignant, the group of magical friends learn some hard lessons and come face-to-face with death.
author: Christine Rose
